trans-unit.source: Contains the information used to update the endpoint address of a specific registration entry in the lookup table of a peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于更新对等解析程序服务的查找表中的特定注册项的终结点地址的信息。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are primarily used to pass registration update request information to the resolver service from a network client of that service.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例主要用于从该服务的网络客户端向解析程序服务传递注册更新请求信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新默认实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo"></xref> class with the supplied peer client ID, registration ID, peer mesh ID, and peer endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo"></xref>使用提供的对等客户端 ID、 登记 ID、 对等网格 ID 和对等终结点地址的类。

trans-unit.source: A peer can have multiple entries for any mesh ID, each for a specific peer endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 对等节点可以有多个条目，对于任何网络 ID，每个特定对等终结点。

trans-unit.source: Each endpoint entry is updated separately.
trans-unit.target: 每个终结点条目将单独更新。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the registration entry to update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>它指定要更新的注册项的唯一 ID。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>它指定提交了已更新的注册项信息的对等客户端的唯一 ID。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that contains the mesh ID of the entry.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含的项的网络 ID。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref> that contains the endpoint address to update for the registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref>包含要更新的注册项的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.
trans-unit.target: 获取提交了已更新的注册项信息的对等客户端的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>它指定提交了已更新的注册项信息的对等客户端的唯一 ID。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否包含此类型的序列化的实例的消息的正文格式是否正确。

trans-unit.source: True if the registration update information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果发件人; 正确格式的注册更新信息的正文为，true如果不是，false。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mesh ID of the registration entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取注册项的网络 ID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that contains the mesh ID of the updated registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含已更新的注册项的网格 ID。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the endpoint address to update for the registration entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取要更新的注册项的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref> that contains the endpoint address to update for the registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref>包含要更新的注册项的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique ID of the registration entry to update.
trans-unit.target: 获取要更新的注册项的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the registration entry to update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>它指定要更新的注册项的唯一 ID。</xref:System.Guid>
